alert.note: Alert for Northern Fulton; Northern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 3:51PM EST until January 13 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches and ice accumulations of up to a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 40 to 60 mph. * WHERE...In New York, Northern Herkimer and Northern Fulton Counties. In Vermont, Bennington and Western Windham Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 1 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Strong winds could cause damage to trees and power lines. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow will fall at elevations greater than 1500 feet. Snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour are possible overnight tonight, especially in the southern Greens.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
